segments.text: I see the woman carefully drying her plate, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflow from the sink is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water spilling out, wasting it like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, standing right in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool reaches for cookies so eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the stool's instability worries me deeply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could tumble and get injured.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits with her hand out, full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sweet moment, but the risks make it poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, highlighting the domestic warmth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, I feel a pang seeing potential trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart, full of unnoticed dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
